thread.section_title: LymphedemaProducts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LymphedemaProducts.com | lymphedemaproducts.com | 3 of 127
thread.title: Donna

author: Donna
title: Donna
text: I wanted to order the package set of 3 sleeves with 3 matching gauntlets but somehow I got to the "set" and only ordered 3 sleeves. When I looked at my confirmation receipt and cc charge, I double checked it and it didn't have the hand gauntlet. I called but in my time zone, they were closed so I sent an email. I got up early and called the help desk and the gentleman was very nice and fixed the order for me. Later someone read the email and responded and said that I ordered the complete set. Felt very taken care of everything came quickly and the order was perfect. Love the products and I am a lifetime customer, most comfortable compression garmets I have worn. Thank you.
